body:
Hi Michalina and Michal,

Thank you for your nice comments. You are right on. Jan. 13th around 3am is the birthday of Ladybug and I should have sent a post for that but things went pretty busy.

FYI I was in RhinoDay last week and showed Michalina's study on Honeybee's and her comment on Honeybee not being yellow. :)

Thanks again for your support and sorry for the later reply. :)
